Regulation Name(s): Gene Expression Profiling Test System for Breast Cancer Prognosis
Specimen Type(s): Formalin-fixed paraffin embedded (FFPE) breast cancer tissue
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Microarray scanners (serial numbers US810R3210, US22502555, US811R3213, US45103019)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Agendia MammaPrint FFPE microarray-based gene expression profiling test for breast cancer prognosis using FFPE tissue.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic test for breast cancer patients (Stage I or II, tumor ≤5 cm, lymph node negative) to assess 5-year risk of distant metastasis using FFPE tissue, for use as a prognostic marker by physicians with other clinico-pathological factors.
